transcripts.text: There's been a number of complaints regarding mold, rats, cockroaches, vermin.  I will take this order.  People think they're trying to look for a conspiracy theory, this was intentional, this was that.  A lot of it is just pure, deliberate indifference to their health, safety, and welfare, these prisoners, and just gross negligence.  I mean, Epstein took the easy way out, the coward's way out.  He killed himself because he couldn't face the evil that he committed.  So when it comes to prisons, we have a duty as a society to properly fund them, to properly run them, and properly manage them.  It needs reform, and it needs change.
